item.title: Get the best for free business and magazine theme for WordPress – Thanks Woothemes
item.description: WooThemes have outdone themselves with their most recent free WordPress business theme. Swatchis a powerful business and magazine theme with its own slider / carousel and a custom homepage layout that has 3 widget areas and up to 4 footer widgets. Seriously â€“ this is the ultimate free theme for any business or serious blogger. It has 2 custom post types, along with the Slides on for the homepage it also has a portfolio for you to show off your work or presentations.
